title: What are the applications of Haptics technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is a fascinating range of new touch technology that Inc has featured in its August 2015 magazine.  Alert shirt, created by Wearable Experiments based in Australia. It “lets fans feel what their favourite Australian Rules Football players experience, from racing heart rates to crushing hits”. This can possibly then also raise the excitement that we now already have in 3D and 4D movies! Pavlok - no prizes for guessing the source of name for this one. It is a wristband meant to help users stop themselves from certain habits e.g. biting nails, smoking, with a mild electric shock sent when the undesired habit is taking place. Lechal - these shoes help with navigation, telling you when its time to change direction on your left or right shoe through vibration signals. This is potentially a great product for the visually impaired. Visit my blog for more articles, at: www.thinkaling.wordpress.com
Force-feedback on video game controllers, positive confirmation of touch screen presses, and basically anything that gives a tactile response as a form of information.
